alert.note: Alert for Meagher (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 16 at 9:09PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Meagher, Judith Basin, and central Cascade Counties through 1015 PM MDT... At 907 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 11 miles southeast of Cascade to 29 miles northwest of Harlowton. Movement was northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... White Sulphur Springs, Stanford, Belt, Hobson, Geyser, Neihart, Fort Logan On The Smith River, Windham, Eden, Sapphire Village, Fort Logan, Stockett, Utica, Checkerboard, Raynesford, Moccasin, Monarch, Martinsdale, Sluice Boxes State Park and Ackley Lake State Park. This includes the following highways... Interstate 15 between mile markers 241 and 246. Highway 200 between mile markers 0 and 64. Highway 12 between mile markers 33 and 76. Highway 89 between mile markers 1 and 88. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
